title: Electronic Arts Is For Sale - Amazon, Apple, and Comcast Want To Buy?

media:group.media:title: Electronic Arts Is For Sale - Amazon, Apple, and Comcast Want To Buy?
media:group.media:description:
The video game industry as of late has seen the likes of Sony and Microsoft engage in a race to acquire other studios and consolidate their respective collection of IPs and publishing talent. 

Now it looks like Electronic Arts, the company behind games such as Madden, Apex Legends, and FIFA, is up for grabs. According to a report by Puck, EA has been looking to sell or merge and almost came close to sealing a deal earlier this year.
